name: Need a Hero (itch)
description:
The evil Baron kidnapped the King's daughter for his evil purposes. And now the king is looking for a hero who will save his daughter and bring her back. "For the great reward !!!" The hero is waiting for treasures, battles, feats and adventures !!! 

 - Action platformer

 - Easy to play! - Beautiful pixel art graphics! :)

 - Battles and traps! - 3 epic boss! - The system of missions!

 - 33 levels!

- Big cards with secret zones!
